commit message:
Bump APK version

Signed-off-by: mvglasow <michael -at- vonglasow.com>

Fix screen real estate issue in German translation (#23). Thx paulle!

Signed-off-by: mvglasow <michael -at- vonglasow.com>

Auto-refresh the wifi network list

Calls mWifiManager.startScan(); every second.

Make wifi networks selectable

The selected network will then move to the top so that it can be better monitored.

Merge pull request #26 from octosquid/master

Improve wifi network list

Hide unused mobile nw views, show network type. Fixes #21. Thx sniperle!

Signed-off-by: mvglasow <michael -at- vonglasow.com>

Add WiFi capabilities, preparing to display WiFi encryption.

Add PNG artwork for WiFi encryption type.
